Package control

Class ToDoControl

java.lang.Object
control.ToDoControl
public class ToDoControl
extends java.lang.Object
The controller for the whole data of the ToDoList. This controller would take in the model as the construction and data. The controller can do function such as addList, addTask, doing different kind of sorting to the ToDoList in the model to support the function for the ToDoView.
Author:
Ofer Greenberg, Quan Nguyen, Quang Vu, Allen David El.

    • model

      private ToDoModel model
      The model which the controller hold to do useful method on ít.

  • Constructor Details

    • ToDoControl

      public ToDoControl​(ToDoModel model)
      Constructor takes ToDoModel object and stores it in the private attribute. The controller interacts between the gui and and the data in order to process the data based on how the controller is used
      Parameters:
      model - the model which is a ToDoModel

  • Method Details

    • addList

      public void addList​(java.lang.String name)
      Author: Quang Vu Purpose: This method will add new list to the model
      Parameters:
      name - name of the new list

    • removeList

      public ToDoList removeList​(java.lang.String id)
      Remove a list with the same name as the id. If there is not a list with that name, return null
      Parameters:
      id - the name of the list to be removed
      Returns:
      the ToDoList has the same name as the id or null

    • renameList

      public boolean renameList​(java.lang.String listName, java.lang.String newName)
      Rename a list in the model which have the same name as listName to the new name. Return true if success and false if not.
      Parameters:
      listName - the name of the list to be changed
      newName - the new name to be changed to.
      Returns:
      indicate if the rename successful or not

    • getList

      public ToDoList getList​(java.lang.String name)

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the ToDoList to be search
      Returns:
      the ToDoList which have the name

    • getTask

      public ToDoTask getTask​(java.lang.String nameList, java.lang.String nameTask)
      Return a task in a list which have the name of nameList, that task will also have the same name of nameTask.
      Parameters:
      nameList - the name of the list to be get the task from
      nameTask - the task which will be get.
      Returns:
      the task to be searched.

    • isImportant

      public boolean isImportant​(java.lang.String nameList, java.lang.String nameTask)
      Check if the task in nameList which has the name of nameTask is important or not. True if it is and false if it is not.
      Parameters:
      nameList - the name of the list to be get the task from
      nameTask - the task which will be checked.
      Returns:
      boolean indicate if a task is important.

      Parameters:

      nameTask - the task which will be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the task is done

    • setImportant

      public boolean setImportant​(java.lang.String nameList, java.lang.String nameTask, boolean newStatus)
      Changing important field in task has the name of nameTask in a nameList.
      Parameters:
      nameList - the name of the list to be get the task from
      nameTask - the task which will be change the importance.
      newStatus - indicate if the task is importance or not
      Returns:
      true if successfully change the important field of the task

      nameTask - the task which will be removed.

      the ToDoTask object

    • renameTask

      public boolean renameTask​(java.lang.String listName, java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String newTaskName)

      Parameters:
      listName - identifier of list
      taskName - identifier of task
      newTaskName - new name for the task
      Returns:
      true if task was found and name updated

      Parameters:
      listName - String represent the name of the list contains the task need to change the due date
      taskName - String represent the name of the task need to change the due date
      dueDate - the new due date
      Returns:
